name: Dreamworld98
description:
Dreamworld98 is going to be the perfect crossbreed between Quake, Unreal and the Elder Scrolls.

90s FPS style & Gameplay paired with Roleplay elements, like stats, item-upgrading and quests.

\/ At time just a Proto-Release is available \/

  • Some early stages of maps
  • HUD
  • Menu
